categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: Darth Vader - Might of the Empire
"Darth Vader - Might of the Empire" is the sixth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com and the Disney Now websites on November 30, 2018.

Darth Vader walks down the ramp of a Lambda-class shuttle as smoke and foam rises. The narrator explains that Darth Vader commands the might of the Galactic Empire as he walks past two rows of stormtroopers, several Imperial officers, and AT-ST and AT-AT walkers in the hangar bay of the Executor-class Star Destroyer Executor. AT-ST drivers and AT-AT pilots stand at attention from the hatches of their vehicles. Vader then walks onto the bridge of the Executor where he watches the assembled Imperial Star Destroyers and TIE fighters of Death Squadron. As the ships fly in formation, Lord Vader says that this will be a day long remembered.
